title: Hour 1 - Doug Gottlieb & Bucky Brooks Guest Hosting
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Doug Gottlieb & Bucky Brooks Guest Hosting
description:
Doug and Bucky, filling in for Dan, talk about the settlement between the NFL and NFLPA involving Deshaun Watson that has resulted in Watson being suspended 11 games and fined $5 million.  Senior NFL Reporter for Yahoo! Charles Robinson joins Doug and Bucky to discuss the latest with the Deshaun Watson settlement, the Lamar Jackson contract situation, and all of the other major headlines around the NFL.  Doug and Bucky weigh in on Tom Brady having no timeline for a return from his leave of absence from the team.

#DougGottliebShow

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
